com.logfiles.backend

Class LogAscRandInputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.InputStream
      • com.logfiles.backend.LogInputStream
        • com.logfiles.backend.LogAscRandInputStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public class LogAscRandInputStream
extends LogInputStream
    Input stream to traverse a file with random access in ascendant way. This input stream can read n lines in ascendant way from a particular position on the file.
    Author:
    alexdel
